gurmukhi: ਕਾਰਤਕ ਮਾਸ ਰੁਤਿ ਸਰਦ ਪੂਰਨਮਾਸੀ ਅਾਠ ਜਾਮ ਸਾਠਿ ਘਰੀ ਅਾਜੁ ਤੇਰੀ ਬਾਰੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kaaratak Maas Routi Sarad Pooranamaasee , Aatth Jaam Saatthi Gharee Aaju Tayree Baaree Hai ?
translation: It is the month of Karlik, and winter season with full moon night. In these eight watches, here is your chance to meet your beloved at any time. (Guru Nanak Dev Ji was born on this day).

gurmukhi: ਅੳੁਸਰ ਅਭੀਚ ਬਹੁਨਾੲਿਕ ਕੀ ਨਾੲਿਕਾ ਹੁੲਿ ਰੂਪ ਗੁਨ ਜੋਬਨ ਸਿੰਗਾਰ ਅਧਿਕਾਰੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Aousar Abheech Bahounaaik Kee Naaikaa Hui , Roop Goun Joban Singaar Adhikaaree Hai ?
translation: Therefore, you too be the rightful person to meet the beloved Lord of myriad other female-like seekers, with your loving devotion, love, worship like beauty and adornment of youthful virtues on this auspicious moment of star configuration.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਤਿਰ ਚਤੁਰ ਪਾਠ ਸੇਵਕ ਸਹੇਲੀ ਸਾਠਿ ਸੰਪਦਾ ਸਮਗ੍ਰੀ ਸੁਖ ਸਹਜ ਸਚਾਰੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Chaatir Chatur Paatth Sayvak Sahaylee Saatthi , Sanpadaa Samagree Soukh Sahaj Sachaaree Hai ?
translation: You are alert and adept in Naam Simran, the sixty main veins of your body are your friends and in your obedience, and you are the possessor of equipoise, beauteous treasure and other items of great value.

gurmukhi: ਸੁੰਦਰ ਮੰਦਰ ਸੁਭ ਲਗਨ ਸੰਜੋਗ ਭੋਗ ਜੀਵਨ ਜਨਮ ਧੰਨਿ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਮ ਪਿਅਾਰੀ ਹੈ ॥੩੪੫॥
transliteration: Soundar Mandar Soubh Lagan Sanjog Bhoga , Jeevan Janam Dhanni Preetam Piaaree Hai ?345?
translation: In this auspicious occasion, acquiring the union of the temple-like body with the beloved Lord on the nuptial bed of the heart will make your human birth and life a blessed one. And thus you become the beloved of your dear and loving husband (God). (345)
